DOC.brief_summary: To determine predictive value attachment rate human embryonic stem cell ( hESC ) -derived trophoblast spheroid ( BAP-EB , embryo surrogate ) onto endometrial epithelial cell ( EEC ) success IVF treatment use model identify EEC surface biomarkers endometrial receptivity .
DOC.brief_title: BAP-EB Predictive Tool Endometrial Receptivity Pregnancy Outcome IVF Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: Study Objectives Purpose : There three objective study : 1 . To determine predictive value attachment rate BAP-EB onto EEC success IVF treatment . The attachment rate BAP-EB onto EEC subfertile woman natural cycle precede IVF cycle determine correlated cumulative live birth rate subsequent stimulate IVF cycle derive frozen-thawed embryo transfer ( FET ) cycle . 2 . To identify surface molecule EEC responsible attach BAP-EB . The biotin-labeled primary EEC surface protein bind onto BAP-EB purify identified mass spectrometry . The bound proteins `` receptive '' `` non-receptive '' endometrial cell line compare . The expression surface proteins endometrial sample obtain Objective 1will correlate BAP-EB attachment rate . 3 . To compare BAP-EB attachment rate expression attachment-related `` receptive '' EEC surface molecules pre-receptive receptive endometrium woman repeat implantation failure ( RIF ) subfertile woman due male factor . To identify woman endometrial defect , woman RIF fail IVF preimplantation genetic screening ( PGS ) recruit . The latter recruitment criterion exclude RIF due embryo aneuploidy . Subjects : Patients recruit Centre Assisted Reproduction Embryology , University Hong Kong Queen Mary Hospital ( HKU-QMH CARE ) University Hong Kong-Shenzhen Hospital ( HKU-SZH CARE ) , Dr Stephen Chow Chun-kay Assisted Reproduction Centre , Kwong Wah Hospital ( SCCARC ) . Treatment Subjects : Endometrial biopsy collect subject attachment rate BAP-EB onto isolate EEC associated implantation pregnancy outcomes IVF expression isolate surface protein . Study duration : 36 month Assessment Safety : 1 . Specification safety parameter . Abdominal pain endometrial aspirate 2 . The method time assessing , record , analyse safety parameter . Subjects ask contact investigator notice abdominal pain endometrial aspirate 3 . Procedures elicit report record report adverse event intercurrent illness . Any abdominal pain document subject ' medical note ask adverse effect intercurrent illness receive IVF treatment . 4 . The type duration follow-up subject adverse event . Subjects follow Department Obstetrics Gynaecology long adverse event .
DOC.criteria: Subfertile woman indicate first IVF woman cryopreserved embryos HKUQMH CARE , HKUSZH CARE SCCARC Women indicate IVF treatment normal uterine cavity demonstrate saline infusion sonogram hysteroscopy Women regular ovulatory cycle The presence endometrial polyp fibroid distort uterine cavity The presence untreated hydrosalpinx IVF treatment carry preimplantation genetic diagnosis The use donor oocyte
